description: This file contains unit tests for the Android project template in the universalinit package. It tests project initialization, template validation, content replacements, script execution, and handling of various configurations and edge cases.

methods.name: temp_dir
methods.description: Creates and cleans up a temporary directory for test outputs.

methods.name: template_dir
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration files, scripts, and sample project files for testing.

methods.name: project_config
methods.description: Creates a sample ProjectConfig object for testing.

methods.name: test_android_initialization
methods.description: Tests the basic project initialization process, including directory creation and content replacement.

methods.name: test_android_template_validates_parameters
methods.description: Validates the parameter validation logic of the Android template.

methods.name: test_android_template_basic_replacements
methods.description: Checks that project info is correctly replaced in template files.

methods.name: test_pre_processing_execution
methods.description: Verifies that the post-processing script executes successfully.

methods.name: test_android_init_info
methods.description: Ensures that the initialization info retrieved from the template contains correct commands and environment info.

methods.name: test_android_with_missing_template_config
methods.description: Tests handling of missing configuration files during project initialization.

methods.name: test_processing_scripts_failure_handling
methods.description: Checks that failures in pre/post processing scripts are handled gracefully.

methods.name: test_template_project_variations
methods.description: Tests project creation with different configurations and verifies correct project naming.

methods.name: test_special_character_handling
methods.description: Verifies that special characters in project info are handled correctly in generated files.
